pages.title: Swapper Wand
pages.text: A wand that allow to swap a block with another without remove it from world

pages.title: Picker Wand
pages.text: A wand that allow to pick-up a block and place where you want

pages.title: Temporal Stupefy Wand
pages.text: A wand that allow to remove TimeWand Entities and apply a short effect of stupefy

pages.title: Advanced Time Wand
pages.text: An upgraded version of Time Wand with more capacity and modes to configure click action

pages.title: Light Wand
pages.text: A wand that allow to place and remove Light blocks , also it can apply Glowing at the facing entity

pages.title: Advanced Light Wand
pages.text: An upgraded version of Light Wand that use FE intend of item durability
